name: Forces Soldier Shooting 3D
description:
Forces Soldier Shooting 3D is the best realistic and unique action shooting game. You are not a contract killer, you feel as a real army best commando, who save own city to hazardous criminal and protect your country in any difficult time.
This is the story of the brave front line army commando to war with hazardous terrorists. In this game you have join the battlefield as a trained sniper commando. Your duty is to kill the enemies’ forces and destroy his camp.
Game Features:
Realistic 3D city Environment
Very smooth control of sniper guns
Multiple thrilling missions for your enjoyment
Improve your skills and accomplish critical levels
Addicting FPS game-play
